name: Cnidarian
description: C compiled WASM with HTML UI and Docker runner #C #WASM #mhn

name: Get bplus apps
description: grab the bplus series of apps, currently* Cnidarian, streamdlrs-gui, and searchrs(set your keys in .env) #bplus #mhn
command: git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-searchrs.git && git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-streamdlrs-gui.git && curl -L -o bplus-searchrs/bplus-searchrs https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-searchrs/releases/download/v0.4.1.1/bplus-searchrs && curl -L -o bplus-streamdlrs-gui/bplus-streamdlrs-gui https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-streamdlrs-gui/releases/download/working/bplus-streamdlrs-gui && chmod +x bplus-searchrs/bplus-searchrs && chmod +x bplus-streamdlrs-gui/bplus-streamdlrs-gui && curl -L -o bplus-streamdlrs-gui/yt-dlp_linux https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/download/2025.11.12/yt-dlp_linux && chmod +x bplus-streamdlrs-gui/yt-dlp_linux && docker pull mrhappynice/cnidarian:latest

name: Launch bplus-searchrs
description: LLM powered web search, built-in and connection to SearXNG #bplus #mhn
